C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

containers.name: minio-mc
command: until (/usr/bin/mc config host add myminio $MINIO_ENDPOINT $MINIO_ACCESS_KEY $MINIO_SECRET_KEY) do echo '...waiting...' && sleep 1; done; /usr/bin/mc mb --ignore-existing myminio/state-storage; /usr/bin/mc policy set public myminio/state-storage; /usr/bin/mc mb --ignore-existing myminio/airbyte-dev-logs; /usr/bin/mc policy set public myminio/airbyte-dev-logs;

controls.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles
Prevent containers from allowing command execution
